title: SPI Orthopaedics and Sports Medicine
description: Here you can search for a Summa physician by name, hospital specialty, or location. Take the first step towards better health at Summa Health.
sitename: Dr. Jeffrey T Junko, MD - Akron, OH - Foot and Ankle Orthopedic Surgery, Orthopedic Surgery, Reconstructive Rearfoot and Ankle Surgery
cleaned_text: Jeffrey T Junko, MD Foot and Ankle Orthopedic Surgery, Orthopedic Surgery, Reconstructive Rearfoot and Ankle Surgery Locations SPI Orthopaedics and Sports Medicine SPI Orthopaedics and Sports Medicine SPI Orthopaedics and Sports Medicine Hudson About Jeffrey T Junko Dr. Junko has been in the Akron area since graduating from the University of Akron in 1995. In addition to his practice, he is the program director for the orthopaedic residency at Summa. Dr. Junko enjoys the time he has outside of work with his wife and four children. Expertise Education Northeastern Ohio Universities College of Medicine Medical School, 2000 Summa Health System Residency, Orthopaedic Surgery, 2005 University of Utah Fellowship, Foot and Ankle Surgery, 2007 Summa Health System Internship program, Orthopaedic Surgery, 2002 University of Iowa Hospital Fellowship, Foot and Ankle Surgery, 2006 Ratings & Reviews Surveys are randomly sent by Press Ganey Associates, Inc. to patients after their in-office visit. Press Ganey provides the survey scores to Summa Health. These patient survey scores are noted here and updated on a monthly basis. Insurance Note: This is not an all-inclusive list of health plans. Additional health plans may be accepted. Please contact your insurance provider for confirmation. - Buckeye (Ambetter Product) - Buckeye Advantage (Medicare Product) - Buckeye Medicaid - ChoiceCare - Cofinity - Direct Care America - Emerald Health Network - First Health Network - Fortified Provider Network
